name: Ricoman (Early Access)
description:
After an alien invasion,  a world funded company QuaraX is ensuring humans survival and salvation.  They recruit and train warriors to become Ricomen, who are deployed to specific mission locations. You are a new recruit, a new hope for human kind's future. Be the Ricoman the world deserves.

We Rebuild.

QuadraX managed to use the Alien Artifact rock to make a powerful bullet that can kill the Alien Swarmers. Most of our facilities that were invaded are built with Titanium walls, so these bullets ricochet a couple of times before it blasts. QuadraX trained special forces called Ricomen, to effectively use these ricocheting bullets. They are teleported to the invaded facilities, to procure data boxes that help us create more powerful weapons, that can annihilate the Aliens settlements.

Game Controls

Move : Arrow keys or ASDW / gamepad Lstick. 

Aim : Mouse / gamepad Rstick. 

Shoot : Left mouse click / gamepad Rtrigger. 

Play : Left mouse click / Gamepad X or A. 

Reset : Left mouse click / Gamepad O or B.

Home : Click home button / Gamepad options.
